question: Which HTML tag is used to insert an image in a web page?
explanation: The tag is used to insert an image in a web page.

question: What is the correct HTML attribute to specify the source URL of an image?
explanation: The "src" attribute is used to specify the source URL of an image.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a hyperlink?
explanation: The <a> tag is used to create a hyperlink.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the URL to navigate when a link is clicked?
explanation: The "href" attribute is used to specify the URL to navigate when a link is clicked.

question: How do you open a link in a new browser tab or window?
explanation: The "target" attribute with the value "_blank" is used to open a link in a new browser tab or window.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the alternative text for an image?
explanation: The "alt" attribute is used to specify the alternative text for an image.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a clickable button?
explanation: The <button> tag is used to create a clickable button.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the text to be displayed on a button?
explanation: The "value" attribute is used to specify the text to be displayed on a button.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating an email link?
explanation: The correct syntax for creating an email link is <a href="mailto:email@example.com">.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the target email address for an email link?
explanation: The "href" attribute with the value "mailto:email@example.com" is used to specify the target email address for an email link.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a link to another section within the same web page?
explanation: The <a> tag is used to create a link to another section within the same web page.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the ID of the target section for an internal link?
explanation: The "href" attribute is used to specify the ID of the target section for an internal link.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating an anchor point?
explanation: The correct syntax for creating an anchor point is .

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the URL of the linked document?
explanation: The "href" attribute is used to specify the URL of the linked document.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating an image as a link?
explanation: The <a> tag is used to create an image as a link.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the alignment of an image?
explanation: The "align" attribute is used to specify the alignment of an image.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a download link?
explanation: The correct syntax for creating a download link is <a href="file.pdf" download>.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the filename of the downloadable file?
explanation: The "download" attribute is used to specify the filename of the downloadable file.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a link to a CSS file?
explanation: The <link> tag is used to create a link to a CSS file.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the type of the linked resource?
explanation: The "type" attribute is used to specify the type of the linked resource.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a link to an external JavaScript file?
explanation: The <script> tag is used to create a link to an external JavaScript file.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the character encoding of the linked script?
explanation: The "charset" attribute is used to specify the character encoding of the linked script.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a link to a video file?
explanation: The <video> tag is used to create a link to a video file.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the source URL of the video?
explanation: The "src" attribute is used to specify the source URL of the video.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a link to an audio file?
explanation: The <audio> tag is used to create a link to an audio file.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the source URL of the audio?
explanation: The "src" attribute is used to specify the source URL of the audio.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a link to a PDF document?
explanation: The correct syntax for creating a link to a PDF document is <a href="document.pdf">.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the alignment of a table cell content?
explanation: The "align" attribute is used to specify the alignment of a table cell content.

question: What is the correct HTML tag for creating a link to a specific section within the same web page?
explanation: The correct syntax for creating a link to a specific section within the same web page is <a href="#section">.

question: Which HTML attribute is used to specify the target frame or window for a link?
explanation: The "target" attribute is used to specify the target frame or window for a link.
